Method.name: GetFornecedorAlphalinc
GetFornecedorInfoSaude
GetAdmissaoAlphalinc
GetPedidoCompraAlphalinc
GetPedidoCompraInfoSaude
GetPrescricaoAlphalinc
Method.Implementation:
set codigoAlphalinc = ""
if (($length(AnoFiaInfoSaude) > 0) && ($length(NoFiaInfoSaude) > 0) && ($length(NoPrescricaoInfoSaude) > 0)) { set numeroFinalFIA = AnoFiaInfoSaude_"/"_NoFiaInfoSaude
&sql(SELECT PrescriptionNumber INTO :codigoAlphalinc FROM SqlUser.MEDPrescription WHERE FREE1 = :numeroFinalFIA AND FREE2 = :NoPrescricaoInfoSaude) }
quit codigoAlphalinc
